document_data.name: Yellow Serpent Border Cliffs
document_data.mainbody: The '''Yellow Serpent Border Cliffs''' was a long stretch of sheer rock that served as a natural boundary between part of the eastern [[Hordelands]] and western [[Shou Lung]], specifically the provinces of [[Mai Yuan Province|Mai Yuan]] and [[Ch'ing Tung Province|Ch'ing Tung]].
document_data.Geography: The cliffs ran for hundreds of miles from the northernmost region of the [[Yehimal]] mountains near [[Nas Trango Shan]] to the peak of [[Shan Trango]] in the south.
document_data.Description: Much of the cliff face was a sheer drop, including a dizzying {{SI|2000|ft}} plunge at the [[Yellow Thunder Falls]].
